article_title: Obama's National Security Strategy Favors Wishful Thinking Over Reality
article_text:
Don’t have time to read the Washington Post or New York Times? Then get The Morning Bell, an early morning edition of the day’s most important political news, conservative commentary and original reporting from a team committed to following the truth no matter where it leads.

article_metadata.description: Obama's vision for diplomatic and military engagement envisages an America capable of responding to a growing list of threats with shrinking forces.
